head.title: Joshua Stanton - FutartisticHub
head.description: Joshua Stanton, a video painter whose brushes and colours are the algorithms of Artificial Intelligence
head.keywords: art, technology, future, artists, photographers, painters, developers, art-lovers, future-lovers, technology-lovers

body.title: Joshua Stanton
body.subtitle: Artificial Intelligence video painting made with generative networks and neural style deep neural networks.
